blogPost.title: Now is the time for HR to go full on with Analytics
blogPost.content:
Talent Analytics is a topic of hot discussion today and information around it can be found everywhere. While some perceive Talent Analytics as drinking the Kool-Aid – most HR practitioners are convinced of its benefits to the business.

People costs are often the largest expense for a company, and analytics can be the secret weapon that shines a light on many organizational challenges. However, for it to be a success the practical approaches that HR should adopt must also be considered seriously.

This expert opinion piece will help you establish a solid foundation for success.

Read more:

http://www.cipd.co.uk/pm/peoplemanagement/b/weblog/archive/2016/09/23/opinion-it-s-time-for-hr-to-be-bold-with-analytics.aspx
